113.content:
"And the winner of the Palm Wood's Most Beautiful Guy is.....James!" The judges announced.

"I'd like to say I'm surprised I won but let's be honest," James said as he went to retrieve his trophy.

The small crowd dispersed and James walked into the lobby. He sat down and pleasingly looked at himself in the mirror.

"You cheater!" James heard yell behind him.

He turned around to see Jet Stetson walking towards him coughing and with an ice pack on his head.

"It's not considered cheating when you look this good," James explained as he combed his hair.

"I know you got me sick so I couldn't compete against you in the Palm Wood's Most Beautiful Guy Competition!" Jet accused.

"I have no idea what you're talking about," answered James.

James has a flashback of him switching Jet's smoothie with one Katie was drinking from when she had the flu last week.

"It doesn't matter because I know you did it. And more importantly I know I would have won if I was able to compete-" Jet's rant was interrupted by a coughing fit.

"I'll get my revenge!" Jet proclaimed and walked away sneezing.

What an idiot, James thought, not giving Jet's threat a second thought.
________________________________________________________________
A week later, Jet had recovered from his illness and was ready to strike back at James. He knew that James frequently went tanning in the Palm Wood's park and would fall asleep. Then he'd wake up when it was dark and go back to his apartment.

Jet thought this would be a golden time to enact his plan.

Just as planned, James tanned in the part and feel asleep. No one was around and Jet approached James without arousing an suspicion.

James was sleeping on a pool chair he had taken from the Palm Wood's pool area.

Jet quickly and quietly tied his arms with rope over his head. He then proceeded to tie his ankles down as well. He used string to tie the big toes of the Adonis's perfectly tanned feet.

James soon woke up.

He shook in the chair attempting to break loose from his restraints.

He was annoyed but assumed Carlos has done this.

"So funny Carlos now let me go!" James demanded.

A figure stepped out behind a tree but it wasn't Carlos.

"Hello James," Jet said.

"Jet this isn't funny let me go. If this is your revenge then consider it done now untie me," James pleaded.

"Ha this isn't even close to what I have planned for you," explained Jet.

Jet teachers into his duffel bad and pulls out two wireless fans. The wiring around the blade was removed and feathers her attached the the blades.

Without speaking he set them right in front of James's pink soles.

James became uneasy as he saw what was about to happen.

"Jet I'm sorry I got you sick but please don't tickle me!" James begged.

"Too late" Jet smirked and he turned the fans on.

The feathers were pure torture for James. The feathers started by tickling between his slender toes, making their way past the ball of his foot, down his perfect sole, and finished at his heel only to repeat again.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

"PLEASE STOP!!! MHAHAHA!! I'M SORRY I CHEATED!" James squealed out.

Jet made his way to the other end if the chair. He moved his fingers through James' hairy pits.

"WHAHA!!! NOT MY ARMPITS PLEASE!!"

Jet moved down and poked his sides.

James was going insane with tears running down his face

Jet's also ticked his rock hard abs, almost as good as his, he thought.

"HELP!!!" James yelled.

"We can't have that James," Jet said as he slipped a gag ball into his mouth.

"MMMMMFFFFFFF!"

Jet stopped the fans and remove the gag ball

"Now James. You've endured quite a lot of tickling. I'll stop and all you have to do is admit that I'm more attractive than you," said Jet.

"No way!!" James replied.

"Fine!" Jet ran two giant feathers around his nipples.

"BHAHAHAHA!!"

"James I think you need to be knocked down a few pegs."

Jet sat down on the ground next to the chair and raised his bare feet to his captive's mouth.

"Worship my feet James!" Jet ordered.

"No way! You can't make me!"

"Yes I can!" Jet assured him as he ran his fingers down his soles.

"HAHAHA! Okay!"

James sucked on Jet's toes. He nibbled on his heels and did whatever Jet commanded.

"Good boy," complimented Jet.

James didn't know why but worshiping Jet's beautiful feet made him hard. He hoped Jet wouldn't notice.

"Hmmm. James I didn't know you liked licking my feet so much," said Jet as he motioned towards his hard on pressing against he shorts.

Jet sat down again. This time he rubbed one foot against James' dick and shoved one in James' mouth.

James and Jet were in heaven.

James moaned with pleasure

James loved being controlled by Jet and Jet loved controlling him.

Jet was ready to change things up.
113.title: Jett Stetson(Rival Tickle/Worship)

123.content: Kendall woke up in a daze. Confused and shocked, he found himself reclined in a kind of restraining chair, encased from his biceps and chest down in a tight wrapping, fastened to the seat from his forehead to his ankles with strong leather belts, completely immobilized. As he look down, he could see that his bound legs were locked straight forward and slightly positioned upward, where at the end his huge, long feet were fastened so that the toes of his dirty converse stuck straight up and his heels were held up by some sort of cushioned support. Though he tried desperately to scream, he realized by feeling around with his tongue that his voice was muffled and blocked by a big ball gag. The room he found himself in looked like somebody's recording studio, though he had never been there himself. Just as he came to understand the scope of his captivity, the door to the room opened slowly, and in came Jett Stinson. Kendall's heart began to race as Jett cracked a smile and greeted him, "I've been waiting for this for a long time, Kendall. Catching you alone in the parking garage was just the right moment for me to chloroform you and haul you back here--to this....undisclosed location". Jett grabbed a stool and placed it a the foot of the chair, popping a squat right in front of Kendall's dirty, stinky shoed feet. His head, hidden by Kendall's massive whompers, concealed the lustful, hungry expression that hung across his slithery face as his fingers stretched over and corressed the outer edges of his shoes slowly, up and down. Of course, Kendall couldn't feel it, but he could hear Jett licking the dirty bottoms of his shoes obsessively and slowly. Kendall muffled out a desperate "stop" as his heart raced in confusion and anticipation. "Don't worry, Kendall. All this time we've been fighting, all I ever really wanted was....your feet". Tears began to well up in Kendall's eyes, as he pondered what Jett was going to do with his excruciatingly ticklish feet. "Please, not my feet!", he tried to mummble through the gag, "Why does it have to be my feet? Anything but my feet!" "Don't worry, Kendall. This isn't going to hurt....I'm here....to treat you." Jett began to untie Kendall's left shoe, as Kendall wept....
123.title: Jett Stinson(Rival Tickle/Worship)

15.content:
"YOU DOGS!! YOU WERE ALL THREE MINUTES LATE TODAY!!" Gustavo yelled at Kendall, Logan, James, and Carlos at Rocque Records. "YOU'RE DOING HARMONIES UNTIL YOUR VOICE BOXES FALL OUT!"

"But Gustavo, we left on time but we had a flat tire," group leader Kendall calmly explained.

"Kendall! You are the dog and I am the owner now stop talking!" He replied.

Kendall didn't say anything.

"Good boy!" Gustavo praised as he patted Kendall on the head.

"ENOUGH EXCUSES!!! GET OUT OF MY FACE'!!!" The record producer yelled.

The boys walked out of his office annoyed with his unnecessary punishment and yelling.

"God. Another day spent doing hours of harmonies all because of something he punishes us for," Logan complained.

"And so what if we're late? It takes time to look this good," James explained, combing his hair.

"I can't take much more of this," said Carlos.

Just then, Kelley returned from her coffee run and knocked on Gustavo's door. He opened it.

"About time," he said.

Just as Kelley reached to give Gustavo his coffee her phone rang. She got her phone out of her pocket while holding the coffee. Her elbow accidentally struck Gustavo's side.

Gustavo let out a giggle.

Kendall, observing the whole thing, raised his eyebrow.

Turning to the rest of the guys, "I think I know how we can make Gustavo a little less angry.
______________________________________________________________

The boys and Kelley always had Thursdays off. However, Gustavo usually came into work to write new music. The boys knew this would be a great opportunity to get revenge since Gustavo would be alone.

Gustavo sat in the studio trying to think of new melodies. Just then, he heard a knock on the door.

"Who is it?" He asked as he opened it.

He was annoyed to see if was just Big Time Rush.

"This better not be a waste of my time!" Gustavo warned.

"Of course not!" Kendall assured him. "We've just been feeling bad about how stressed we've made you so we built you a relaxation chair."

"A what?"

"I designed a chair that massages your feet, back, and neck all at once," Logan explained.

"It feels amazing!" Carlos added.

"Yeah it's great!" Said James.

Gustavo, after working the entire day, was tired and in need of a little relaxation.

"Um. Well thank you dogs. So where is it?" Asked Gustavo.

"Right this way," Kendall answered and guided his producer to the dance studio.

Gustavo thought the designer was peculiar. It looked like a recliner with spaces to put your feet and arms into holes that were secured by a lock.

Typically, Gustavo would recognize how fishy this seemed but he was too tired to realize it.

"I can't wait!" Exclaimed Gustavo.

"Neither can we," said the boys.

Gustavo sat in the chair and put his hands and feet into their respective slots. Kendall locked them into place.

"So how does it work?" Asked Gustavo.

"Like this!" Carlos proceeded to remove his shoes and socks. Then, he used 10 tiny restraints to hold back his chubby toes.

Gustavo didn't understand why he did this.

"Now what?"

"Well, let's remove this heavy jacket of yours," replied James and he cut off his Gucci jacket.

"Hey!!!" Yelled Gustavo.

By now, he was wearing just pants and t-shirt.

"You see Gustavo. We've seen how stressed you've been and think we've found a solution," explained Kendall.

"And what might that be?" Gustavo pondered.

"We're gonna make you laugh like a school girl'" announced Logan.

A wave of panic suddenly seized Gustavo.

Just then, James pulled out a feather and glided it up and down his pudgy foot.

"IF YOU THINK-haha THAT YOU'RE GONNA -hahaha THEN YOU'RE-" Gustavo bursted out laughing.

"Good boy!" Kendall said as he patted Gustavo on the head.

James and Carlos ran feathers in between his toes and down his exposed sole and Logan started pinching his sides.

Soon James and Carlos were driving Gustavo made as they dragged their tongues along his foot. They sucks on his toes causing him to howl with laughter.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!" Gustavo erupted in laughter.

James and Carlos went to another room to retrieve more tickle supplies. Logan dug his fingers into his bosses armpits.

"HAHAHA! MMMMAAAHHAHAHA! PLEASE STOP!!" He begged.

"That's funny. I think we asked you to stop yelling at us," said Kendall.

Kendall proceeded to rub baby oil on the soles of Gustavo's ticklish feet.

He trickled his fingers on his heel and under the ball of the foot.

"MHAHAHA!"

Teats rolled down his face.

James and Carlos returned with two electric toothbrushes and tape.

They positioned the toothbrushes on his feet and wrapped them with the tape.

"Please don't! I'll be nicer! I'll change just stop tickling me!" Gustavo pleaded.

"Oh Gustavo we already know you're gonna change we just need to show you who's boss around here," said Kendall.

James and Carlos turned on the brushes.

"WHAHAHAHA!!!"

Logan finished running his fingers over his necks.

The boys watched from the side at the sight of their strict boss laughing uncontrollably.

"Good work guys!" They all high fived.

"Wanna go get lunch on the other side of town and decide what we'll do when we come back?" Asked Logan.

"Sounds like a plan" said Carlos.

The boys walked down the hallway. Gustavo's loud laughter still audible.
15.title: Gustavo Rocque (Stephen Glickman)
